content.body: yulia: I recently added additional information to the explainer for the resource management proposal based on your feedback that some additional context around how this could be integrated into DOM APIs should be included. If you have some time, could you peruse https://github.com/tc39/proposal-explicit-resource-management#relation-to-dom-apis and let me know if that was what you were looking for?
